item.title: Acting, acting, acting...
item.description: Yesterday was the first taped casting session of the new season. What generally happens is that our casting agents (we have both US and Canadian casting agents) audition actors for a particular role, and send us tape of the session....
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: Familiar Faces
item.description: Pre-production is humming along here at Bridge Studios in Burnaby, BC. Familiar faces are popping up everywhere. Today I saw Michael Blundell, one of our D.O.P’s and Kenny Gibbs, the SG-1 Props Master. He’s the guy we talk to about...
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: Front and Center
item.description: I just talked with Brad Wright about this week’s Atlantis episode, Epiphany. Now, if you look closely at the credits, you’ll see a familiar name in an unfamiliar place: Story written by Brad Wright & Joe Flanigan. Joe Flanigan? Colonel...
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: Where were we?
item.description: Welcome back, sci-fi fans. If you feel anything like I do, you just blinked and all of the sudden it’s 2006. That’s a good thing, because the second half of the season of Stargate SG-1 and Stargate Atlantis kicks off...
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: Fight! fight! fight!
item.description: Well, it’s a strange time of year around here. The last of the shows are being prepped as we speak, and the end of the production season is nigh… There’s the tendency to let up, but you mustn’t give in…....
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: Ho hum...
item.description: Big Sci-Fi Friday. On SG-1, you’ll see Prototype and The Fourth Horseman. Next week on Atlantis you get Aurora and The Lost Boys. Lots of episodes tonight… so I’m just going to throw out some behind-the-scenes information I’ve discovered. Yes,...
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: If you build it...
item.description: Further to last week, I literally just overheard Joe Mallozzi talking to himself while reading Carl Binder’s script, Inferno. Joe: “Taranis? I thought we used that for something else? It sounds familiar.” Uh oh… Carl might snap – I fear...
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: An alien planet by any other name
item.description: Did you ever wonder where all these alien names come from? I mean: Jaffa? Baal? Vala? Yat’yir? (rolls right off the back of the throat, that one). How do these writers come up with them? Well, I asked some of...
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: Big Ideas
item.description: I walked into work today past the closed Iris – the bay doors to the SG-1 set were wide open. It reminded me of the day the actor playing Tenat came to our end of the hall to show the...

item.title: Inanities
item.description: I logged onto gateworld today and was completely transfixed by one simple post: “Can a Wraith eat an Ori?” And this is really where my job gets ridiculously fun, because being me, I can just walk two steps to where...
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: Kiss and tell...
item.description: Well there’s no fact checker, but all of us here at Stargate do believe we’re breaking new ground this week on Stargate Atlantis. In an effort to compete with Will & Grace, this week’s Atlantis episode, entitled “Duet” offers… Wait...

item.title: Ronon Dex in the house
item.description: Now, I don’t know how many of you are religious out there, but can you imagine sitting around, brainstorming, thinking about races and aliens and then coming up with an interesting idea and POOF! Making it happen… Just like that?...

item.title: Medium
item.description: I’m sitting in my office, alone, when suddenly… a strange feeling comes over me… I feel the spirit of another life force overtaking me… my eyes roll back into my head, and my eyelids start to flutter… my body starts...

item.title: Keeping it real...
item.description: So initial feedback to the blog is good, for the most part… Most people think it’s informative, upbeat, candid and fun… Almost everybody likes it. Except for one person. One guy thinks it’s too “fan-boy”. One guy thinks it’s too...
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine

item.title: New Beginnings
item.description: Well, just like in Poltergeist….”We’re baaaaa-aaaaack”. Yup, SG-1 Season 9 and Atlantis Season 2 premiere tonight and it’s going to be a whole new season of sci-fi twists, turns, new villains, new heroes, old villains in new roles, old characters...
item.dc:creator: Alex Levine
